titleStmt.title: An ordonnance of the Most Christian King, forbidding his subjects to have any commerce with the Spaniards and commanding them to commit hostilities upon them. Of the nineteenth of October, 1673. Done out of French, according to the copy printed at Paris.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1643-1715 : Louis XIV)

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Savoy, printed by Tho. Newcomb,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
